snippet: The tax agreement was one of the few accomplishments at the G-20 St. Petersburg meeting.
abstract: Editorial commends Group of 20 nations for committing to exchanging information automatically on tax matters by the end of 2015, calling it important step toward curbing tax avoidance; praises endorsement of plan to prevent multinational corporations from avoiding taxes through creative use of offshore accounts.
lead_paragraph: The tax agreement was one of the few accomplishments at the G-20 St. Petersburg meeting.
